description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治与军事人物，中国共产党党员，中国人民解放军少将，被称为“独臂将军”。为叶剑英之子，在中共第二代高干子弟中具影响力，有“太子党的精神领袖”之称。
description.en: A political and military figure of the People's Republic of China, a member of the Communist Party of China, and a major general in the People's Liberation Army, known as the 'one-armed general'. He was the son of Ye Jianying and influential among the second generation of high-ranking cadres' children, sometimes referred to as the 'spiritual leader of the princelings'.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国开国元帅，中国共产党、中华人民共和国和中国人民解放军的卓越领导人之一。叶选宁之父。
description.en: A founding marshal of the People's Republic of China, and one of the preeminent leaders of the Communist Party of China, the People's Republic of China, and the People's Liberation Army. Father of Ye Xuaning.
